title: Meeting Action Items
description: Action items extracted from meeting transcript dialogue. Identifies explicit and implicit commitments made by speakers.

action_item_count.description: Total number of action items found in the transcript

meeting_date.description: Meeting date in YYYY-MM-DD format, or 'UNKNOWN' if not stated in the transcript

participants.description: Participants ordered by speaking frequency based ONLY on transcript dialogue

speaking_count.description: Approximate number of speaking turns in the transcript

action_items.description: Action items extracted from transcript dialogue. Includes explicit commitments ('I will', 'I'll') and clear conditional agreements ('I can', 'I'll do X if Y').

title.description: REQUIRED FORMAT: 'AI - [FU - ]<up to 10 word summary>'. Use 'FU - ' prefix if assigned to someone other than Haje.

summary.description: Concise summary of the action (up to 10 words)

description.description: The exact commitment from the transcript or close paraphrase

discussion_point.description: Topic for future 1:1 discussion. 2-3 sentences. Start with '(as discussed in [meeting name])'

slack_message.description: 2-3 sentence friendly Slack reminder with action, deadline, and context. Do NOT include the person's name.

mentioned_in_context.description: Timestamp or dialogue excerpt showing where the action item appears
